## CacheMetadata

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/cache/src/use-cache.ts" sourceLine="55" packageName="@commandkit/cache" />

Configuration options for cache behavior

```ts title="Signature"
interface CacheMetadata {
    ttl?: number | string;
    name?: string;
    tags?: string[];
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### ttl

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`number | string`}   />

Time-to-live duration in milliseconds or as a string (e.g., '1h', '5m')

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />
